Package jsimple.logging

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILoggerFactory
    ILoggerFactory instances manufacture Logger instances by name.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Level
    Logging level.
    LogEnterLeave  
    Logger
    The jsimple.logging.Logger interface is the main user entry point of JSimple logging API.
    LoggerFactory
    The LoggerFactory is a utility class producing Loggers for various logging APIs, most notably for log4j, logback JDK 1.4 logging, and JSimple logging.
